description:
Make the water feel as warm as it looks. Perfect for summer and shoulder-seasons on Canadian surf breaks, this full-body wetsuit offers great stretch and comfort. Sized for teens, it has a wide back entry that's easy to get in and out of.

  • Eco Limestone Veoprene with flatlock seam construction
  • 3mm thick neoprene on the torso and legs
  • 2mm thick neoprene arms
  • Duraflex knee panels
  • Water-tight back zipper entry
  • Recommended water temperature: 13-18°C
name: Xcel Axis Flatlock 3/2mm Back Zip Full-body Wetsuit - Youths
